reviews.review: My kids (ages 7 and 4) loved it!  I enjoyed it myself as well. Not sure why the ratings are so low, is give this movie a solid 8 out of 10.
Good God what a corporate fucking mess. the fact that they dragged Sir Patrick Stewart into this and made him a literal piece of shit is a disgrace to the world of animation as we know it.
1/4 Lego Movie, 1/4 Inside out, 1/4 Wreck-It Ralph, and 1/4 sewer water is the recipe for this piece of Patrick Steward ;)
For what it was, I though it was a pretty decent movie.

Was waiting for it to be a shit movie because of all the hate but it turned out a really good movie.
Recommend it 5/5

It's a very weak movie inspired by such successful ones like "Wreck-It Ralph", "Inside Out" and "The Lego Movie". And it takes the best element of them.
In its core, The Emoji Move (EM) represents "Sausage Party" for younger audience, with the original "Toy Story" dark style. That's how good chasing scenes in it.
Writing/Plot is steep and boring, but at the same time keeps viewer on the point for entire movie.
Filler material utilized marvelously. It doesn't drives all your attention to it and it respects viewers' effort to take a look. You will never see anything offensive in a frame like a bare bottom, breasts, saliva or urine.
Jokes/visual gags and visuals overall are fairly innocent and pristine in this movie.
I would reccomend my child to see this movie if only they are not afraid of cartoonish genocide and imminent 'wipeout'.

I liked this movie even though the critic don't. I have walked out of movies that the critics loved before and liked ones they hated. If the movie has a theme that you like, go and see it regardless what others say about it.

The Emoji Movie...Proof that Hollywood has officially given up on making decent blockbuster films, and instead want to cash in on the only thing they think they have a shot at...trends. What will we be seeing next? YouTube: The Movie? An Instagram Story? Adventures on Facebook? Once Upon A Twitter Tweet? Heaven help us if any of those movies are getting greenlit as we speak.

This movie is extremely disappointing, its a waste of money! Its sad to see such good song put into a bad movie. The point of this movie is stupid and a waste of time watching. It feals like your paying money watch adverts and sponsors. The plot is the same as every other movie and feals like a rip of Wreck it Ralph and The Lego Movie put into a low quality production. Waste of money DON'T GO SEE!
this deserves no stars it was way to cringy your kids deserve better and it made no sense nonsense a movie should at least make sense even if it's bad
